One of his party's strongest advocates for conservative policies, Mike Pence is among the GOP's most outspoken critics of Ronald Reagan Barack Obama . We've been trying to listen first to Hoosiers and then to other voices around the country about where they think we might best serve in the years ahead and "we'll be making a decision before the end of this month," Mike Pence told about 100 people at a conference room in the Henry County, Ind., Hospital.
